entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:56 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
